subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded James Blake lost in the Stockholm Open semifinals, 3-6, 6-1, 7-6 (3), to Thomas Johansson, ending Blake’s 13-match winning streak in the tournament. Johansson will face Ivo Karlovic in today’s final. Karlovic beat Tommy Haas, 6-4, 6-3, in the other semifinal.
